name: Popizdunac 3D FPS
description:
Singleplayer shooting adventure where you try to beat your confusions, before losing your sanity.

Made in era when I didn't have mouse on laptop, press F1 for controls.

Game is free, if you wanna donate, feel free to do so via paypal on davor.hranjec@ g m a i l . c o m .

Cheers and let me know if you manage to beat the game. ;)
